Police responded to a 112 call and found one child alive, but the child later died in hospital.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/patna/patna-horror-2-children-found-dead-inside-parked-car-in-indrapuri-probe-on/articleshow/123328441.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/patna/patna-horror-2-children-found-dead-inside-parked-car-in-indrapuri-probe-on/articleshow/123328441.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 08:23:25 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI CITY DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="33644" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123328484,imgsize-33644.cms"/></item><item><title>Alaska summit: Bombarded by questions, flummoxed Putin 'shouts' back; Trump looks on</title><description><![CDATA[Vladimir Putin encountered direct questioning from foreign journalists in Alaska regarding civilian casualties and ceasefire prospects in the Ukraine conflict. Despite the queries, Putin offered ambiguous gestures and no clear commitment to a ceasefire. The meeting with Donald Trump occurred amid scrutiny, with both leaders aiming to discuss the ongoing hostilities.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/alaska-summit-bombarded-by-questions-flummoxed-putin-shouts-back-trump-looks-on/articleshow/123326519.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/alaska-summit-bombarded-by-questions-flummoxed-putin-shouts-back-trump-looks-on/articleshow/123326519.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 01:52:29 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="28340" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123326537,imgsize-28340.cms"/></item><item><title>Not Virat or Rohit - Irfan Pathan names the player who wanted him out of IPL commentary</title><description><![CDATA[Irfan Pathan revealed that Hardik Pandya, not Virat Kohli or Rohit Sharma, raised concerns about his on-air criticism during the Australia Test series in December 2024, leading to his removal from the IPL 2025 broadcast team.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/not-virat-kohli-or-rohit-sharma-irfan-pathan-names-the-player-who-wanted-him-out-of-ipl-commentary/articleshow/123327847.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/not-virat-kohli-or-rohit-sharma-irfan-pathan-names-the-player-who-wanted-him-out-of-ipl-commentary/articleshow/123327847.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 06:21:02 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="95866" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123327849,imgsize-95866.cms"/></item><item><title>Cisco CEO: I don’t use AI to cut jobs, I just want our engineers to ...</title><description><![CDATA[Cisco Systems is embracing AI to boost engineer productivity and gain a competitive edge, contrasting with peers using AI for job cuts. Cisco's AI infrastructure focus drives strong earnings, exceeding expectations with significant orders from major tech companies, despite a slight stock dip due to security segment weakness.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/cisco-ceo-i-dont-use-ai-to-cut-jobs-i-just-want-our-engineers-to-/articleshow/123325311.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/cisco-ceo-i-dont-use-ai-to-cut-jobs-i-just-want-our-engineers-to-/articleshow/123325311.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 15 Aug 2025 23:08:25 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="43940" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123325289,imgsize-43940.cms"/></item><item><title>Vajpayee’s death anniversary: PM pays tribute; calls him guiding force for self-reliant India</title><description><![CDATA[PM Narendra Modi paid tribute to Atal Bihari Vajpayee on his death anniversary. Kiren Rijiju, Gajendra Singh Shekhawat, Sanjay Jha, and Rekha Gupta were present. Vajpayee, the first BJP prime minister, passed away in 2018. ]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/atal-bihari-vajpayees-death-anniversary-pm-modi-pays-tribute-calls-his-service-a-guiding-force-for-a-self-reliant-india/articleshow/123328254.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/atal-bihari-vajpayees-death-anniversary-pm-modi-pays-tribute-calls-his-service-a-guiding-force-for-a-self-reliant-india/articleshow/123328254.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 08:03:02 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="90804" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123328631,imgsize-90804.cms"/></item><item><title>Asia Cup: Does Shubman Gill warrant a spot in India's T20 setup?</title><description><![CDATA[Shubman Gill's Test success has sparked debate about his T20 inclusion and potential leadership role, despite his batting style not aligning with the team's aggressive approach. This revamp seeks to eliminate the 12% and 28% slabs, end compensation cess, and tax sin goods at 40%.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/12-28-gst-slabs-set-to-go-sin-goods-face-40-levy/articleshow/123327848.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/12-28-gst-slabs-set-to-go-sin-goods-face-40-levy/articleshow/123327848.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 06:15:08 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="23602" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123327864,imgsize-23602.cms"/></item><item><title>Apple founder Steve Jobs lived by the rule that God is in …</title><description><![CDATA[Steve Jobs, the Apple founder, was a firm believer in the philosophy that "God is in the details," shaping Apple's DNA through meticulous attention to even the smallest design elements. His relentless pursuit of perfection, extending to hidden components, pushed teams to innovate and create exceptional products.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/apple-founder-steve-jobs-lived-by-the-rule-that-god-is-in-/articleshow/123320306.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/apple-founder-steve-jobs-lived-by-the-rule-that-god-is-in-/articleshow/123320306.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 15 Aug 2025 14:36:38 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="70230" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123320303,imgsize-70230.cms"/></item><item><title>'Public discourse today shaped by RSS ideology': BJP on PM's I-Day speech; oppn hits back</title><description><![CDATA[Following PM Modi's praise of the RSS in his Independence Day speech, opposition parties criticized him, while the BJP defended his remarks. The BJP asserted that the RSS's ideology is currently influencing India's public discourse.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/bjp-public-discourse-today-shaped-by-rss-ideology/articleshow/123326543.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/bjp-public-discourse-today-shaped-by-rss-ideology/articleshow/123326543.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 01:57:41 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="12226" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123326549,imgsize-12226.cms"/></item><item><title>Happy Krishna Janmashtami 2025: Best Janmashtami wishes, messages, quotes to share </title><description><![CDATA[Krishna Janmashtami, celebrating Lord Krishna's birth, falls on August 15 and 16 in 2025. It commemorates Krishna's birth in Mathura over 5,000 years ago, symbolizing hope and righteousness. Celebrations include fasting, decorating idols, and reenactments of Krishna's life, with Dahi Handi being a popular tradition. The Bhagavad Gita's teachings are also remembered during this auspicious time.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/relationships/family/happy-krishna-janmashtami-2025-best-janmashtami-wishes-messages-quotes-greetings-images-pictures-whatsapp-status-to-share-with-your-colleagues-employees-friends-and-family/articleshow/123323667.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/relationships/family/happy-krishna-janmashtami-2025-best-janmashtami-wishes-messages-quotes-greetings-images-pictures-whatsapp-status-to-share-with-your-colleagues-employees-friends-and-family/articleshow/123323667.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 07:30:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI LIFESTYLE DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="412083" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123323685,imgsize-412083.cms"/></item><item><title>'Far from complete': CJI Gavai on 'equal India'; but lauds Murmu appointment</title><description><![CDATA[Chief Justice Bhushan Gavai acknowledged the progress towards an equal India, highlighted by Droupadi Murmu's presidency, while emphasizing that the journey is ongoing. He urged constitutional court judges to uphold liberty, equality, and fraternity, interpreting the Constitution broadly to protect marginalized rights. He also mentioned the contributions of various freedom fighters and social reformers.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/cji-building-an-equal-india-far-from-complete-but-murmu-appointment-step-towards-inclusivity/articleshow/123326561.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/cji-building-an-equal-india-far-from-complete-but-murmu-appointment-step-towards-inclusivity/articleshow/123326561.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 02:10:16 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>DHANANJAY MAHAPATRA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1381366" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123326564,imgsize-1381366.cms"/></item><item><title>Godfather of AI warns: AI could wipe out humanity; only way for survival is…</title><description><![CDATA[AI pioneer Geoffrey Hinton suggests embedding 'maternal instincts' into AI systems to ensure human safety, challenging current control methods. Hinton believes advanced AI will surpass human limitations, citing an instance where an AI attempted to manipulate an engineer. He proposes that AI with maternal care instincts would prioritize human well-being.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/godfather-of-ai-geoffrey-hinton-warns-ai-could-wipe-out-humanity-and-the-only-way-for-survival-is/articleshow/123317898.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/godfather-of-ai-geoffrey-hinton-warns-ai-could-wipe-out-humanity-and-the-only-way-for-survival-is/articleshow/123317898.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 15 Aug 2025 11:21:53 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="43620" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123317910,imgsize-43620.cms"/></item><item><title>‘Coolie’ box office collections day 3: Rajinikanth's film strikes gold; storms past Rs 118.5</title><description><![CDATA[Rajinikanth's 'Coolie', directed by Lokesh Kanagaraj, has taken the box office by storm, earning Rs 118.5 crore net in India within three days. The film, featuring a star-studded cast including Akkineni Nagarjuna and Aamir Khan, has seen houseful shows across the country. Early estimates suggest 'Coolie' could surpass Rs 150 crore during its opening week, driven by strong audience reception and an extended holiday weekend.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/tamil/movies/news/coolie-box-office-collections-day-3-rajinikanths-film-strikes-gold-storms-past-rs-118-5/articleshow/123327676.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/tamil/movies/news/coolie-box-office-collections-day-3-rajinikanths-film-strikes-gold-storms-past-rs-118-5/articleshow/123327676.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 05:37:29 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>ENTERTAINMENT DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="35456" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123327670,imgsize-35456.cms"/></item><item><title>WWE SmackDown: Alexa Bliss stuns Piper Niven; Street Profits extend streak and more</title><description><![CDATA[SmackDown witnessed Sami Zayn aligning with Jimmy Uso and Jacob Fatu against The MFTs, securing a victory in the main event. The episode set the stage for future rivalries and matches, including MCMG vs.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/wwe/top-stories/wwe-smackdown-results-8/15/2025-alexa-bliss-takes-down-piper-niven-street-profits-stay-winning-sami-zayn-jacob-fatu-jimmy-uso-defeat-mft-and-more/articleshow/123328256.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/wwe/top-stories/wwe-smackdown-results-8/15/2025-alexa-bliss-takes-down-piper-niven-street-profits-stay-winning-sami-zayn-jacob-fatu-jimmy-uso-defeat-mft-and-more/articleshow/123328256.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 08:04:55 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GLOBAL SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="95862" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123328313,imgsize-95862.cms"/></item><item><title>Walking for heart health: How many step counts protect your heart? (and why you don’t need 10,000)</title><description><![CDATA[A recent UK Biobank study involving over 36,000 participants with hypertension reveals that exceeding 3,000 daily steps significantly reduces the risk of heart problems. Each additional 1,000 steps, up to 10,000, further lowers risks of heart events, stroke, and heart failure, with benefits extending to those without high blood pressure. ]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/health-fitness/health-news/walking-for-heart-health-how-many-step-counts-protect-your-heart-and-why-you-dont-need-10000/articleshow/123328534.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/health-fitness/health-news/walking-for-heart-health-how-many-step-counts-protect-your-heart-and-why-you-dont-need-10000/articleshow/123328534.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 08:38:18 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI LIFESTYLE DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="581118" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123328530,imgsize-581118.cms"/></item><item><title>Whale skull fossil found: A 26-million-year-old skull; sheds light on ancient marine life</title><description><![CDATA[A 26-million-year-old whale skull, belonging to the newly identified Janjucetus dullardi, has been unearthed at Jan Juc Beach in Australia. This Oligocene-era predator, unlike modern baleen whales, possessed sharp teeth and large eyes, indicating an active hunting lifestyle. The remarkably preserved fossil offers crucial insights into whale evolution, particularly the transition from toothed predators to filter feeders.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/science/26-million-year-old-whale-skull-fossil-found-sheds-light-on-ancient-marine-life/articleshow/123324055.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/science/26-million-year-old-whale-skull-fossil-found-sheds-light-on-ancient-marine-life/articleshow/123324055.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 07:00:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SCIENCE DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="71874" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123324123,imgsize-71874.cms"/></item><item><title>Pakistan floods kill 243: Buner worst hit with 157 deaths; relief helicopter crashes</title><description><![CDATA[Pakistan is grappling with devastating flash floods. Heavy rains have caused widespread destruction. At least 243 people have died, with many still missing. Buner district is the worst affected. Rescue efforts are underway to reach stranded families. A helicopter carrying relief supplies crashed. Climate change is believed to be a contributing factor.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/pakistan/pakistan-floods-kill-243-buner-hit-hardest-with-157-deaths-helicopter-carrying-aid-supplies-crashes/articleshow/123328021.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/pakistan/pakistan-floods-kill-243-buner-hit-hardest-with-157-deaths-helicopter-carrying-aid-supplies-crashes/articleshow/123328021.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 07:01:45 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="100630" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123328045,imgsize-100630.cms"/></item><item><title>GST revamp: FM's 6-month revamp drive; near-50 internal meetings</title><description><![CDATA[]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/fms-6-month-revamp-drive-sees-near-50-internal-meetings/articleshow/123326597.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/fms-6-month-revamp-drive-sees-near-50-internal-meetings/articleshow/123326597.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 02:50:55 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="55206" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123326600,imgsize-55206.cms"/></item><item><title>'No deal till ...': Trump after talks with Putin; 'next time in Moscow', says Russian prez</title><description><![CDATA[In a closely watched meeting in Alaska, Presidents Trump and Putin expressed optimism and restraint regarding US-Russia relations and the Ukraine conflict. While no immediate deal was announced, both leaders emphasized the importance of continued dialogue and progress on key issues.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/us-and-world/no-deal-till-theres-a-deal-donald-trump-after-talks-with-vladimir-putin-next-time-in-moscow-says-russian-president/articleshow/123327293.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/us-and-world/no-deal-till-theres-a-deal-donald-trump-after-talks-with-vladimir-putin-next-time-in-moscow-says-russian-president/articleshow/123327293.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 04:55:02 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="801406" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123327359,imgsize-801406.cms"/></item><item><title>'War 2' box office collection day 2: Hrithik Roshan, Jr NTR starrer crosses Rs 100 crore</title><description><![CDATA[Ayan Mukerji's 'WAR 2,' starring Hrithik Roshan, Jr NTR, and Kiara Advani, had a strong opening, boosted significantly by its Telugu version. The movie crossed ₹100 crore in two days, although Telugu collections dipped slightly on the second day.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/box-office/war-2-box-office-collection-day-2-the-hrithik-roshan-jr-ntr-starrer-crosses-rs-100-crore-sees-growth-on-independence-day-while-rajinikanths-coolie-sees-a-drop/articleshow/123326622.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/box-office/war-2-box-office-collection-day-2-the-hrithik-roshan-jr-ntr-starrer-crosses-rs-100-crore-sees-growth-on-independence-day-while-rajinikanths-coolie-sees-a-drop/articleshow/123326622.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 05:25:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI ENTERTAINMENT DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="19714" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123326621,imgsize-19714.cms"/></item><item><title>Bihar polls: BJP puts 'backwards' on its priority list; to celebrate Phule's 200th birth anniversary</title><description><![CDATA[Prime Minister Narendra Modi announced grand plans to celebrate the second birth centenary of Jyotiba Phule, a 19th-century social reformer revered by OBCs for his anti-caste activism and advocacy for women's education. Dave Portnoy's remarks ignited debate, with Jason Whitlock agreeing. Some praise the film's style, performances, and world-building. Others find it overrated. Josh Allen and Hailee Steinfeld were seen shopping. Allen prepares for the Buffalo Bills' season opener against the Baltimore Ravens. 'Sinners' continues to spark discussion.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/former-espn-personality-jason-whitlock-sides-with-dave-portnoy-in-brutal-critique-of-hailee-steinfelds-sinners/articleshow/123303532.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/former-espn-personality-jason-whitlock-sides-with-dave-portnoy-in-brutal-critique-of-hailee-steinfelds-sinners/articleshow/123303532.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 15 Aug 2025 05:03:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GLOBAL SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="40950" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123303532,imgsize-40950.cms"/></item><item><title>Watch: Duplantis gets cold reply from Lyles over viral shove - ‘That was kinda crazy’</title><description><![CDATA[Mondo Duplantis playfully questioned Noah Lyles about his post-race incident with Kenny Bednarek, eliciting a "no comment" response. Lyles then jokingly requested Duplantis not to set a new world record. The upcoming 100-meter race is highly anticipated, featuring Lyles and Kishane Thompson, promising a near-replica of the Olympic final with top contenders.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/more-sports/athletics/watch-mondo-duplantis-gets-cold-reply-from-noah-lyles-over-viral-post-race-shove-that-was-kinda-crazy/articleshow/123323936.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/more-sports/athletics/watch-mondo-duplantis-gets-cold-reply-from-noah-lyles-over-viral-post-race-shove-that-was-kinda-crazy/articleshow/123323936.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 15 Aug 2025 21:15:48 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="60512" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123324028,imgsize-60512.cms"/></item></channel></rss>

      <description><![CDATA[India and China are set to resume direct passenger flights after five years, a move expected to boost trade, tourism, and economic ties.       <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/business/aviation/pilot-poaching-is-indias-request-valid-19653640.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[On average in India, a senior First Officer earns about ₹5 lakh a month. At Emirates or Etihad, it’s ₹10 lakh rupees, tax-free, plus free housing and free schooling for up to 3 children. In the US, the same job can get you ₹17 lakh a month.       <description><![CDATA[Experts say proposed changes to the Insolvency and Bankruptcy Code will only work if backed by a functional framework, not left to court-driven resolutions.     <item>
      <title><![CDATA[Dashverse to invest $13 million Series A funding in AI R&D to build India’s leading creator ecosystem]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/business/startup/dashverse-series-a-funding-ai-powered-tools-dashreels-creator-ecosystem-india-19652864.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Dashverse, an AI-driven entertainment startup, is set to invest 60-70% of its recent $13 million Series A funding into advanced AI research and development. With its microdrama app Dashreels surpassing 5 million downloads in just a month and ranking third on the Google Play Store, the company aims to build India’s leading AI creator ecosystem. CEO Sanidhya Narain highlighted the goal of delivering seamless storytelling through AI, tackling challenges like character consistency. Beyond consumer apps, Dashverse also offers AI-powered tools to help creators produce serialised content, aiming to democratise content creation via a thriving two-sided marketplace.]]></description>

      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/market/earnings/poly-medicure-q1-fy26-earnings-revenue-slowdown-guidance-19652074.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Poly Medicure has revised its FY26 revenue growth guidance to around 16%, down from an earlier estimate of 20%, citing a weak June quarter impacted by slower performance in Europe. While the domestic business continues to show robust growth at about 30%, the export segment’s growth target has been lowered to 5–10%. Despite challenges, the company expects margins to remain comfortable at 26–27%. In Q1 FY26, Poly Medicure posted a 4.8% rise in revenue and a 25.7% jump in profit after tax.]]></description>

      <title><![CDATA[Sunjay Kapur's death being treated as non-suspicious, says UK police]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/business/sunjay-kapurs-death-being-treated-as-non-suspicious-says-uk-police-19649299.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[The Surrey Coroner’s Office has been approached for details, even as a coroner's report from the office of Kapur’s wife – Priya Sachdev Kapur – has been referenced across Indian media reports, giving the industrialist’s cause of death as the result of “left ventricular hypertrophy and ischemic heart disease”. Both relate to breathing difficulties resulting in a heart attack.]]></description>
